subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: In the financially strapped Detroit enclave of Highland Park, Mich., the former N.F.L. star Reggie McKenzie took matters into his own hands to prepare for his annual football camp.
snippet: In the financially strapped Detroit enclave of Highland Park, Mich., the former N.F.L. star Reggie McKenzie took matters into his own hands to prepare for his annual football camp.
